issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description: No prompt for selecting code base when creating a module using appc new -p ios -t timodule. I'm using CLI 7.1.1
fields.summary: Cannot create a Swift native module --Solved
fields.environment:
Operating System
  Name                        = Mac OS X
  Version                     = 10.14.6
  Architecture                = 64bit
  # CPUs                      = 8
  Memory                      = 24.0GB
Node.js
  Node.js Version             = 9.11.2
  npm Version                 = 5.6.0
Titanium CLI
  CLI Version                 = 5.2.1
  node-appc Version           = 0.2.49

comments.body: Issue has been solved. I didn't had the titanium npm module installed. The titanium module bundled with appc does not offer the prompt.
